name: Gothic Winter Night (Graphical Demo)
description:
This scene was rendered as part of a module for university.

The assets used are:

  • https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/dynamic-winter-environmen...
  • https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/17c2d7d545674204a7644c3c0...
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/street-lamp-9ec5bdd5993f4cec9a99aaa8dccb5ed7

No changes are made to any of these assets and are not used for any profit.
